post.contents:
June 14

  • Fixed: Search in Drive pane wasn’t working right
  • Fixed: Search for emails and files in other panes too
  • Fixed: Search highlighting was sometimes buggy when searching for multiple small words
  • Fixed: Links were sometimes parsing at the wrong position in the text
  • Insert link menu is better at removing links: a button to remove the link, and can clear link or text

June 13

  • Fixed: Overview was not collapsible in flat search
  • Fixed: Old style dates like @now could make typing slow
  • Improved styling of agenda: reduced some padding, right aligned day number
  • Insert link edits existing links better
  • Select full items when multiple items are selected
  • Added a - button to the formatting toolbar to collapse it to a small … button. There’s also a new setting in General settings to disable it completely.

June 6

  • Fixed: Sometimes notes were not displaying previews
  • Fixed: Shift + Enter closes note editor

June 3

  • Fixed: Double insert of links from insert link menu
  • Fixed: Prefix showing on the last line of items in add item menu
  • Fixed: Crash pasting images
  • Fixed: Background of note field in add item menu in dark theme matches other fields
  • Fixed: Arrow keys in outline were broken by update earlier today

June 1

  • Fixed: Crash dragging a file from desktop onto a pane

May 31

  • Fixed: Pane rendering was wonky when manually resized and then opening an email preview
  • Fixed: Alt or Option clicking a date removes the whole date + duration, and works correctly when it spans multiple lines
  • Fixed: Items with durations in the agenda are draggable

May 26

  • Fixed: Recursive collapse is instant now
  • Fixed: Delete selected toast hides after the normal 5 seconds
  • Enter on an empty prefixed item does not remove the prefix
  • Add an icon next to file name in sidebar
  • Enter on an empty prefixed item does remove the prefix (as it did previously)

May 25

Launch of new version
